MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Rhoshirwaun and surrounding areas.  This is causing flickering and reduced power as well as total loss of supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.20PM. Our engineers are on site making further network investigations and our team will work to get your power back to normal in stages by 7.00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.13PM on 12th January 2021.
